data.name: InvalidOrExpiredLinkHeading
data.value: The link is invalid or expired

data.name: InvalidLinkMessage
data.value: The confirmation link seems to be incorrect or has expired.

data.name: RequestNewLinkMessage
data.value: Please request a new link from the report page and open it within 24 hours.

data.name: RepeatedErrorHint
data.value: If the error persists, check that the link hasn’t already been used (it’s valid only once).
